fields.name: salesperson_in_charge_id
fields.label: Sales Person In-Charge
tooltip: For Esco offices who have sales team and want to assign this opportunity to their specific sales person

fields.name: stage_id
fields.label: Stage
tooltip: Hot=70%-90% (Esco Specs, our price is within their budget, customer prefers Esco, timeline is not important) Warm=40%-60% (Customer is considering Esco but also comparing with other brands) Cold=below 40% (reminder for the future, to keep in touch)
